title: Iowa PGA Championship
text:
The Iowa PGA Championship is a <a href="golf">golf</a> tournament that is the championship of the <a href="Iowa">Iowa</a> section of the <a href="PGA%20of%20America">PGA of America</a>. Although the section was founded in 1916, the records of the Iowa section show tournament winners only back to 1953. <a href="Bob%20Fry%20%28golfer%29">Bob Fry</a>, holds the record for most victories with five. <a href="Richie%20Karl">Richie Karl</a>, who won the <a href="B.C.%20Open">B.C. Open</a> on the PGA Tour, won this event four consecutive times, from 1982 to 1985.
Winners.
Source:
